mapper.select:
SELECT /* WBJARoundListMapper.selectRoundList */ * FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD , (SELECT NM FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS PLACE_NM , (SELECT SUM(PRIZE_PMT) FROM CX_EPISD_PRIZE_DTL WHERE EPISD_SEQ = A.EPISD_SEQ) AS PRIZE_PMT ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_PRIZE_PART_DTL A INNER JOIN CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL B ON A.RSUME_SEQ = B.RSUME_SEQ INNER JOIN CX_APPCTN_MST C ON B.APPCTN_SEQ = C.APPCTN_SEQ INNER JOIN CX_EPISD_MST D ON C.EPISD_SEQ = D.EPISD_SEQ WHERE D.YEAR = A.YEAR ) AS NOM_CNT ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT A.APPCTN_SEQ , A.EPISD_SEQ , A.MNG_STTS_CD , B.YEAR FROM( SELECT A.APPCTN_SEQ , B.EPISD_SEQ , A.MNG_STTS_CD FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL A INNER JOIN CX_APPCTN_MST B ON A.APPCTN_SEQ = B.APPCTN_SEQ WHERE A.MNG_STTS_CD = 'PRO_TYPE05002_02_003') A INNER JOIN CX_EPISD_MST B ON A.EPISD_SEQ = B.EPISD_SEQ) RARA WHERE RARA.YEAR = A.YEAR) AS REG_CNT FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC limit #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT /* WBEACarbonListMapper.getRoundListTotCnt*/ COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD , (SELECT NM FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS PLACE_NM , (SELECT SUM(PRIZE_PMT) FROM CX_EPISD_PRIZE_DTL WHERE EPISD_SEQ = A.EPISD_SEQ) AS PRIZE_PMT ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A

SELECT /* WBJARoundListMapper.selectRoundDtl */ EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE ,PLACE_SEQ ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID ,REG_IP ,REG_DTM , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,MOD_ID ,MOD_IP ,MOD_DTM , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,ADD_NTFY_CNTN FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey}
SELECT /* WBJARoundListMapper.selectYearDtl */ MIN(YEAR) AS YEAR FROM CX_EPISD_MST

SELECT /* WBJARoundListMapper.selectPrizeList*/ PRIZE_SEQ ,EPISD_SEQ ,MRTS_CD ,PRIZE_CD ,PRIZE_PMT , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD = A.MRTS_CD) AS MRTS_NAME , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD = A.PRIZE_CD) AS PMT_NAME FROM CX_EPISD_PRIZE_DTL A WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey} ORDER BY PRIZE_SEQ ASC

SELECT /* WBJARoundListMapper.selectRoomList */ (SELECT NM FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS NM , (SELECT CD_NM FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST B INNER JOIN CO_CODE_MST C ON B.RGNS_CD = C.CD WHERE B.PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS RGNS_NAME , (SELECT ZIPCODE FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS ZIPCODE , (SELECT BSC_ADDR FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS BSC_ADDR , (SELECT DTL_ADDR FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS DTL_ADDR , (SELECT RPRSNT_TEL_NO FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS RPRSNT_TEL_NO FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey}
SELECT /* WBJARoundListMapper.selectEpisdDtl */ * FROM CX_EPISD_MST WHERE BSN_CD = 'BSN10' AND EXPS_YN = 'Y' AND YEAR = CURDATE() AND ACCS_END_DTM > NOW() ORDER BY ACCS_END_DTM, BSN_STRT_DTM ASC

select /* WBJARoundListMapper.selectOPtnList */ a.file_seq as file_seq , b.file_ord as optn_ord from co_file_mst a inner join co_file_dtl b on a.file_seq = b.file_seq where a.file_seq = 5512 and a.use_yn = 'Y' and b.use_yn = 'Y'
